reviewText: Another good Allegra show!  We wish they had more available!!
We love this show!  Wish they would make some more of them!

This was my oldests favorite show as a small child.  So happy I could find this.  It didn't even matter that it is on VHS.
She and Mr' Riff should be resurrected.  Allegra is adorable.  My daughter loved her when she was little, Of course, you can only find this on VHS...DVD doesn't exist.
the first one was Face Shrinking The 2nd one was face introducing a song The Last one was Face saying goodbye i Love This Video!
